info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Transylvania County through 645 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Brevard, or 5 miles south of Black Balsam Area, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Rosman, Lake Toxaway, Gorges State Park, Balsam Grove, Connestee and Little River In Transylvania County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
